content.body:
click true or false

  • The lessons begin at 20 past 8. true / false
  • Every lesson lasts 45 minutes. true / false
  • We have got 3 breaks. true /false
  • The first break is 15 minutes. true / false
  • The second break is half an hour. true / false
  • The third break is 15 minutes. true / false
  • Our lunch break is at 12.15. true / false
  • We take our lunch in a plastic bag. true / false
  • In England, the children don't bring lunch to school. true / false
  • Sometimes they eat pizza at school. true / false.
  • They get school lunches, prepared by mothers. true / false
  • Children need healthy food. true / false
